title: Sales Outreach Admin Dashboard
shortDescription: Comprehensive sales outreach admin dashboard with real-time analytics, campaign management, and team performance tracking
challenge: Building a comprehensive sales dashboard that provides real-time insights into outreach campaigns, team performance metrics, and campaign effectiveness while maintaining excellent user experience and data visualization.
solution: Developed a responsive React dashboard using TypeScript and Material-UI for the interface. Implemented real-time data visualization with Recharts, created campaign management workflows, and built comprehensive analytics features with React Router for navigation. Used Axios for API communication and date-fns for date handling.

metrics.label: Response Rate
metrics.description: Average email response rate across campaigns

screenshots.alt: Main dashboard showing campaign analytics and metrics
screenshots.caption: Real-time dashboard displaying campaign performance and team metrics
Comprehensive campaign creation and management interface
